title: 223 28 "Zoro Bares His Fangs! A Savage Animal Stands in the Way!"Transliteration: "Kiba o Muku Zoro! Tachihadakatta Yajū" (Japanese:牙をむくゾロ!立ちはだかった野獣!) Hidehiko Kadota Junki Takegami February 27, 2005(2005-02-27)[20] September 15, 2013
transformers_text: 223 28 Zoro Bares His Fangs A Savage Animal Stands in the Way Transliteration Kiba o Muk u Zoro Tachi had ak atta Ya j Japanese Hidehiko Ka dota Junk i Take gam i February 27 2005 2005 02 27 20 September 15 2013 On their way to The Palace of the Sea God Robin's group meets an entranced Zoro It looks like Zoro wants to fight so Luffy urges the others to keep going without him They apprehend the kid but the whistle was what was really stealing their memories Zoro returns still entranced but Luffy's nowhere to be seen
